document.full_text: on the day her 2-year-old daughter died in june 2008, casey anthony moved in with her boyfriend and gave no indication that anything was wrong, the now-former boyfriend testified on wednesday.
document.title: casey anthony "normal," "happy" after tot's death
lines_and_colors: on the day her 2-year-old daughter died in june 2008, casey anthony moved in with her boyfriend and gave no indication that anything was wrong, the now-former boyfriend testified on wednesday.
